name: neills-skills
description: Production-grade skills for Claude Code: ExecPlan for structured planning and REPL-Driven Development for Clojure 1.12

commands.name: skills
commands.description: Browse, search, and install skills from the marketplace

commands.name: skills-browse
commands.description: Browse all available skills by category

commands.name: skills-search
commands.description: Search for skills by name, description, or tags

commands.name: skills-install
commands.description: Install a skill from the marketplace

commands.name: skills-info
commands.description: Get detailed information about a specific skill
